sen.j: 松平 信志（まつだいら のぶゆき）は、丹波亀山藩の第5代藩主。
sen.e: Nobuyuki MATSUDAIRA was the fifth lord of Kameyama Domain, Tanba Province.
sen.cmt: 「信志」の読みは用語集 “Nobuzane” ではなくエクセル中の “Nobuyuki” を記載しています。
sen.e: Nobuyuki MATSUDAIRA was the fifth lord of the Kameyama Domain, Tanba Province.
Nobuyuki MATSUDAIRA was the fifth lord of the Kameyama Domain, Tanba Province.

sen.j: 丹波亀山藩形原松平家10代。
sen.e: The tenth family head of the House of Katahara-Matsudaira in Kameyama Domain, Tanba Province.
The tenth family head of the Katahara-Matsudaira family in the Kameyama Domain, Tanba Province.
sen.cmt: the House of Katahara-Matsudaira→the Katahara-Matsudaira familyに修正、the Kameyama Domainとしました。
sen.e: The tenth family head of the Katahara-Matsudaira family in the Kameyama Domain, Tanba Province.

sen.j: 天明5年（1785年）7月30日、丹波亀山藩分家で大身旗本の松平庸孝の長男として生まれる。
sen.e: On September 3, 1785, born as the first son of Tsunetaka MATSUDAIRA, the branch family of the lord of Kameyama Domain, Tanba Province and Taishin hatamoto (a greater vassal).
On September 3, 1785, Nobuyuki was born as the first son of Tsunetaka MATSUDAIRA, the branch family of the lord of the Kameyama Domain, Tanba Province and Taishin hatamoto (a greater vassal).
sen.cmt: born→Nobuyuki was bornとし、the Kameyama Domainとしました
sen.e: On September 3, 1785, Nobuyuki was born as the first son of Tsunetaka MATSUDAIRA, the branch family of the lord of the Kameyama Domain, Tanba Province and Taishin hatamoto (a greater vassal).

sen.j: 享和2年（1802年）、第4代藩主・松平信彰が若死にしたため、その養子として家督を継いで第5代藩主となり、12月に従五位下・紀伊守に叙任される。
sen.e: In 1802, when the fourth lord Nobutaka MATSUDAIRA died at an early age, Nobuyuki succeeded to the position of family head as an adopted son of Nobutaka to become the fifth lord, and was conferred to Jugoinoge Kii no Kami (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade, Governor of Kii Province) in December 1802 or January 1803.
sen.cmt: 「信彰」の読みは用語集 “Nobukata” ではなくエクセル中の “Nobutaka” を記載しています。
sen.e: In 1802, when the fourth lord Nobutaka MATSUDAIRA died at an early age, Nobuyuki succeeded to the position of family head as an adopted son of Nobutaka to become the fifth lord, and was conferred to Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade), the Governor of Kii Province in December.
sen.cmt: 「従五位下・紀伊守」の表記を修正、統一事項より、December 1802 or January 1803→Decemberに修正
sen.e: In 1802, when the fourth lord Nobutaka MATSUDAIRA died at an early age, Nobuyuki succeeded to the position of family head as an adopted son of Nobutaka to become the fifth lord, and was conferred to Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade), the Governor of Kii Province in December.

sen.j: 文化13年（1816年）4月15日（4月18日とも）に死去。
sen.e: Died on May 11 (also said May 14), 1816.
Died on May 11 (also said May 14), 1816.

sen.j: 後を七男・信豪が継いだ。
sen.e: Succeeded by Nobuhide, his seventh son.
His seventh son Nobuhide succeeded to his position.
